scripts.format: cd client/ && npm run format && cd ../server/ && npm run format  && cd ../ && prettier --write "build/*.js"  "build/*.mjs" "docu/**/*.mjs"
scripts.test: cd client/ && npm test &&  cd ../server && npm test
scripts.dependencyCheck: ncu --packageFile ./package.json > npm_dependencies_report.poinz.md && ncu --packageFile ./client/package.json > npm_dependencies_report.poinz-client.md && ncu --packageFile ./server/package.json > npm_dependencies_report.poinz-server.md
scripts.postinstall: cd client/ && npm i && cd ../server && npm i
